buildCommand: git config --global user.name 'Vercel' && git config --global user.email 'vercel@vercel.com' && git config --global init.defaultBranch main && GIT_AUTHOR_NAME='Vercel' GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL='vercel@vercel.com' GIT_COMMITTER_NAME='Vercel' GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL='vercel@vercel.com' npm run build && npm run setup
